p: Although several meteorological stations exit with data extending back to the early 20 th century [ 41], a consistent network of long temperature and precipitation data close to our sampling sites is still lacking. Hence, we used high-quality interpolated data from the Climate Research Unit (CRU) TS3.22 [ 42] that fully covers the 1901–2012 period. Temperature and precipitation records were extracted from the nearest grid points to our sampling sites ( Fig 1) and normalized over the baseline period 1961–1990.
